name: Cyber-Fan (Demo Version)
description:
An Adventure About Being Famous Online!

Cyber-Fan is a top-down shooter, where you gather Followers and collect Sponsors to become famous online! This short game is the demo version and was made for a final school project. It will release in 2 weeks!

Story

In Cyber-Fan, the player controls Gram, a young man that wants to be an Influencer! After buying some Influencer Gloves from two shady merchants, Gram gains the power to shoot likes and gather Followers! Now Gram sets out on a journey around Social City to become famous online! Will he succeed?  Or will he be canceled by the Trolls or the Hackers.

Feature List
  • Run and Explore! Explore Social City, a cyber-city with Trolls and Hackers everywhere! Find all of the Sponsors to unlock the gate and become famous!
  • Shoot! Shoot all of the baddies. No trolls and Hackers can handle the power of the Influencer Gloves!
  • Collect Followers to help you on your journey! Your followers will walk behind you and help you defeat your enemies!
Credits
  • João Rodrigues (@Jo_Cant_Draw): Student at Etic. Producer, animator, artist, programmer, etc. 
  • Music: Bensound (Jazz Comedy, All That), Pixabay (Fun Life, FASSounds)
